website_summaries.verdict: The Outdoor Technology Privates are solid Bluetooth headphones with deep bass response and a cable for wired listening.
pros: Distortion-free wireless Bluetooth audio with boosted bass response
Detachable audio cable for wired listening
cons: Audio could be a bit more crisp in the high-mids
The name is a little ridiculous

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are comfortable and well made. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the materials - for the price point it feels pretty high end. I love the material and design. The ear pieces are not quite tight enough; you'll need to be constantly adjusting them if you're moving around at all. This does not bother me because I'm sedentary when using them for music and/or games. I don't think I could use them for exercising, though.
customer_reviews.author: LowestTruth

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headphones to date
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome so far , sound is wicked for a Bluetooth headset , work perfectly for calls , only thing is they get a little uncomfortable if on for long periods ,and some design mods for wearing sunglasses would be good( but that's all headphones). I am also very good at trashing headphones and have only had these a short while so it will be interesting to see how long they last , that said the construction is pretty sturdy and battery life is really good
customer_reviews.author: Ralphee

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I've been using them every day for a couple weeks now when I'm cleaning at work or in the house or out for a walk. They're comfortable and I've had no issues with the battery life. I especially like the touchpad control for volume and track skipping, which even works when I wear latex gloves while cleaning. It's especially helpful because before these I was pausing in whatever I was doing every five minutes to take my phone out of a back pocket to skip, pause, etc.
customer_reviews.author: K-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 monhts
customer_reviews.text: This is the now the fifth set of these headsets we have purchased since June 2019. Two are still functioning but three basically no longer work on bluetooth (they charge and connect but there is no longer sound coming through). We loved the size and portability but there is something wrong with the bluetooth function. I hate creating ewaste but fear this is the case!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Coming Apart Too Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have had these less than 4 months, don't use them every day, but they are still falling apart already. The black around one of the speakers is coming off. It makes me very sad, since I have two family members who have this same brand and have been happy with theirs for years. Don't know if I just got a bad set, but I will definitely not be getting my money's worth out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jaime

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great initial review, here are my Pros/Cons: Pros: 1- great packaging 2- fits well (I have a large head) 3- good sound quality 4. Easy to pair 5. Aesthetically pleasing — nice look Cons: 1- Are these sweat or water resistant? If not that would be nice for an outdoor headset Overall I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: techgeek

customer_reviews.title: Pairs easily and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use in my home when the kids are asleep. It easily connects with my apple TV. The quality of the product is good. Nice, canvas feel to the fabric and the cushions on the ear muffs rival that of my Bose noise cancellation headphones. I haven't tested battery length but they haven't died yet. Sound quality is just fine for anyone but the most critical of audiophiles. I also like the fabric-wrapped headphone cable that comes with the headphones (in case you don't want to go wireless). For under $40, I am considering getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Shmeg McGee

customer_reviews.title: How did I miss these?
customer_reviews.text: I can't resist: I love my Privates! In the wireless headphone landscape, which is surprisingly sparse, these are standouts: compared to Bose (oversized), Beats (overpriced), Harmon-Kardon (also gigantic) and some other generic Best Buy experiments (low quality), these fit the bill. They have everything - great sound, comfort, uninterrupted connection and style. Unlike most wireless headphones, they aren't bulky, the controls are seamless and they even fit my notoriously small head (and snugly inside a small messenger bag). My non-audiophile assessment is that my privates rock... (sorry)! Oh and the video sent me over the edge.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend anyone who has an active life to get these headphones. I had a pair for about five years, sadly they recently died. I did everything you are not supposed to do with head phones to these head phones. They survived being dropped and thrown, rain and extreme temperatures. The quality of the sound never wavered till the end. I've tried out other headphone in the same price range and none of them had the same quality. I'm really happy to have purchased my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: elyse raggio

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I'm not an audiophile, but I think the sound is great. The touch features work great and are super handy. The range is great for when I'm walking around in my apartment. They are also really comfortable for running and they stay in place really well. I have the green ones, and my coworkers say I look like a hipster but I think they look awesome. Really a great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Everson

customer_reviews.title: Well built and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best I’ve ever had. These are the third pair I’ve gotten and have yet to be disappointed. Even made sure to get the insurance this time since the last couple of ones were either lost or damaged by my mistakes. They are will built and the touch control are very simple to use and well responsive. Overall worth the purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry R.

customer_reviews.title: ... headset works well and for the price has very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The headset works well and for the price has very good sound quality, although I'm partially deaf, so the high frequencies are meaningless to me. One major flaw is the lack of a clear on/off switch and an indication when the headset is in fact off. I find it necessary to keep the set plugged in to ensure it's ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Deck

customer_reviews.title: Beat my Beats.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: They look and fit great. Very light weight and compact. They sound as good as my two year old bulky ugly and heavy wireless Dre Beets. Con: I find the touch controls hard to use and clumsy.The volume level control is not as fine tuned as a textile press button which I would rather prefer. I find when I use it, it either goes way loud or way soft with little fin between. Not so much a problem as I generally use the phone or computer slider for volume control after I set the headphones manually.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N Jones

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about these, especially the hardwire option during those times when the battery is drained. Good color selection. These are on the ear, not over if noise cancellation is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones. I've been wanting these for years and even though 3 years is a lifetime in technology, these headphones are still fantastic! Finally made the plunge because they're $40 now! They're everything I could have wanted. Sound quality is excellent, and the touch controls are so futuristic and accurate! The Bluetooth connection is perfect. Even though it's just Bluetooth 3.0, the connection is still crystal clear - walked a good 20 feet away and could still hear the music. So far the battery hasn't died and I've used them pretty heavily for the past three days, so battery life is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor range, everything else great.
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, the touch controls are great, the only problem is the range which is really bad. Maybe my unit is defective because the range is less than ten feet. Beyond that and they drop out the audio (they are fully charged when). I’ve thrown away the box now so can’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: DarenR

customer_reviews.title: Love the aesthetics and the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the aesthetics and the color! I like that it doesn't bulge out like other headphones such as the beats. It's nice for someone with an already bigger sized head that it doesn't bulge too much. The sound quality is decent but not the best, especially the bass, but without it cranked too high it's good enough. The battery life is as advertised. I can listen to it all day at a medium level and itll only be 1/3 of the way drained and have 2/3 charge left. It's super use friendly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Eo

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound, lightweight, folds down easily
customer_reviews.text: These are actually really great considering the price. They're lightweight, keep a charge and are VERY loud. I have never had trouble pairing them to either of my devices (Macbook Air and Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge) via Bluetooth. I've only tried using the ATX cable it comes with once (on an airplane) and it seemed faulty. The microphone is also not that great. Since I mainly used these headphones for being able to listen to music wirelessly, the last two points didn't weigh very heavily not my revoew. Mostly a heads up for those who would have a use for using an aux cable or mic for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Yessss!! Do it. They are surprisingly amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. They’re lightweight, stylish and comfortable (the smallest setting fits my small head perfectly). I love the battery life feature, how loud they go and how clear the sound is. Also, the Bluetooth range is pretty good. The mic quality is just as crystal clear too. Best $30 ever spent. I’m sending back $238 Even EarPrint headphones in favor of these.
customer_reviews.author: messiejessie

customer_reviews.title: A solid pair of meh headphones, wouldn't buy again. Bluetooth quit.
customer_reviews.text: Used for 2 years now and the Bluetooth just up and quit working. Can't find the signal on any device. The faux leather ear covers started pulling out on the edges after about 1 year. They're just not that durable but not surprised for such a low price. Not terribly comfortable because the headphones can't rotate front to back, just top to bottom, and creates a bit of a pressure on the front edge pushing more than the back edge. A solid pair of meh headphones, wouldn't buy again.The upside is they look cool, completely different than most other headphones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: kara hall

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These really hurt my ears. The controls were not easy, I ended up going with the Skull Candy Hesh 2’s. They were a lot more comfortable, and controls were in a better spot. Not bad headphones, but I like complete over the ear better.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Lane

customer_reviews.title: They look great. And the sound is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The right ear stopped working. This is my second pair of these. I have them in black as well but when I left at my friend’s house, I ordered the yellow. I get lots of compliments on them. They look great. And the sound is amazing! I love the Bluetooth feature, especially when I am biking but I have only had this pair for one month and the right side stopped playing! I am bummed!! Sending them back now!
customer_reviews.author: valencia clay

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Really can't believe how good these are. For the money you can't do better. I was looking for something I could wear while working outdoors. The various earbuds and over the ear headsets I tried always fell out of my ears, requiring me to "fiddle" with them constantly. This headset is comfortable, stays put, and easily survived a day of splitting and stacking firewood. I practically forgot I was wearing them, which was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones For An Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: These have great sound, are comfortable to wear and look fantastic. I have a small head and have trouble with headphones fitting well but these are perfect. The swipe pad controls take a few tries to get used to but are convenient once you do.
customer_reviews.author: jmb1853

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday carry
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a few months now, seem very durable despite being thrown into a backpack every day. Not as comfortable as they could be.
customer_reviews.author: Elor Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth, great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are very hardy headphones, we only broke our last pair because I was impatient and tried plugging in the wrong cord and it broke the charger. It was forced, so they really stand up to abuse! Lasted for three years prior. Sound is amazing and your beats headphones have nothing on the ODTs.
customer_reviews.author: G Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this and the tags from outdoor technology. I don't list gripes because everyone's opinion is different. Pros: Great bass, and clear sound on calls. I have the nexus 5 so top of the line android OS maybe a difference maker as far as sound and Bluetooth connectivity is concerned. Used these on the DC metro and it also noise cancels a bit. Slide controls take getting used to but I love that too. I will continue to purchase outdoor technology.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Have bought a few of these and they work great, had one pair lose bluetooth after a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Have bought a few of these and they work great, had one pair lose bluetooth after a couple of years, the recent deal for these yellow ones was not to be missed and they are the same color as our lawn mowers . . !!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Wearing them for a long time (few hours at least - I use them at work) can hurt since they are on-ear, but that is no different from any on-ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable for all day tunes
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable headphones. Ive compared theee to bose on ear and plantronics back beat pro 2. Those other headphones may be slightly.better on sound but if you use headphones all day along, these are the most comfortable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Sound good, Durable, Low Profile
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Got them on a lighting deal and they are definetly worth the money. Great durable headphones for a college student. They fold up with a very small profile and fit anywear in my backpack. Love these. Sound great for the price. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality better price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price.. got sick of my daughter stealing my green ones so got her a pair in blue.. she lives them.. sons gonna getting a pair for his bday as well in s couple months.. outstanding product girl $30!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Larson

customer_reviews.title: These are really cool!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sounds great, look great, and just overall work great. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The range is wonderful. I can walk all over my house and ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these have FAR exceeded my expectations. I primarily use these headphones for listening to Podcasts and Netflix, with some music thrown in there. Audio is always clear and crisp. The range is wonderful. I can walk all over my house and sound is still crisp and clear. Taking phone calls on these is a dream. My only minor issue is that there is apparently quite a bit of sound "leaking" my husband says he can it seems like I must be blasting it, but really I'm not. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Even though I am disappointed, I tried to get him to go to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband second pair. The first ones ripped at the seams. They did not last a year. Even though I am disappointed, I tried to get him to go to a different brand, but he likes the looks of these.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars is fair
customer_reviews.text: Style and feel are 5 stars, sound is decent...so I feel 4 stars is fair. I believe these were produced several years back and my original pair received from Amazon was faulty, but they replaced them easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great overall for $30 headphones but....
customer_reviews.text: Loved the headphones, would honestly get them again, but they're very delicate and one drop has completely disabled the power button, rendering the features completely useless... and the service window closed yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: wayne spearman

customer_reviews.title: Quality Headphones at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product for the price point. I tested how two other headphones around the same price and these exceeded the others by quite a large margin in terms of sound quality. The bass is very strong, I love it. The band that goes over head is cloth which shouldn't be a real issue but I know some have their preferences. The sides are easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've owned for the price. Controls are super handy and sound is great. Comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: I received my Privates bluetooth headphones today and theye are awesome. They connected very quickly with the bluetooth on my Ipad Air. For the price, they have a great sound. The other thing that surprised me was that they very comfortable on my ears, even with glasses and hearing aids on. I would recommend these head phones any time. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carl Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Great range and sound!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones for the price. The sound is great and the range is outstanding. I would not recommend these for sweaty workouts as the ear pads collect moister. For $50 the quality and sound can't be beat! These do run a little small as far as fit for those of you with larger heads. Give them a shot..you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Looney

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. I love the voice quality and noise cancellation works well. I love that I can connect it to my computer by wire and to my phone by bluetooth. Also, one positive point is that when I use it during workout, it stay firm on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mahbod

customer_reviews.title: My husband uses them all the time when he is ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses them all the time when he is outside doing yard work & has his phone connected to it so if I need him I just call him & he answers me!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and well built
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and well built. Bought for husband to use with his lawn business. He loves them. Can't hear regular sets over his mower engine. Blue tooth also.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J. Kershner

customer_reviews.title: One for me, one for my wife, and we both love them.
customer_reviews.text: One solid piece of gear. When the battery goes, you can still use them with a 3.5mm jack. Great design feature. They sound great, are comfortable for the most part (long wear means they push on my ears a bit uncomfortably, but I have big ass ears, so your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: mjollnir

customer_reviews.title: Its about as comfortable as all other overear headphones and really can't be ...
customer_reviews.text: Mic only works on Bluetooth so its really a headset for phones. Its about as comfortable as all other overear headphones and really can't be worn for long periods of time. That said when I work at UPS and I want music this is my go-to grab. It stays on my head, doesn't feel super gross when covered in sweat, and has a battery that lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Best head phones ever!!! And affordable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many different brands and this one fits my life and my head! From driving skid stears to rough riding horses on the trails, these are the best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as their marshal counterparts IMO. Plus less than a third of the price! (and COLORS)
customer_reviews.author: Zen Phony

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones I've owned for many different uses
customer_reviews.text: The Floyd mayweather of earphones. Pound for pound u want find better for the price. Or even our this price range. Cool retro look.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great product totally worth the money!! I use these at the gym and get all sweaty and they still work perfectly. Seriously recommend them!! :) not to mention they look bad ass and aren't too big/small. perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Vettori

customer_reviews.title: ... pair for less than 30 dollars and these work great. I use them to ride my bike and ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair for less than 30 dollars and these work great. I use them to ride my bike and workout. Very comfortable and hold up very well. I wouldn't spend anymore than 45 dollars on them, but they do have a solid sound and stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are simply amazing. I am surprised how loud they get, even if you are using the Aux cord or not, no difference. Very light, well constructed set. I have no regrets purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: Cody B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: no problems with connecting and no hiccups it’s connects to iPhone perfect but my android is another story but that android doesn’t connect to a lot of other Bluetooth things so it might just be the phone
customer_reviews.author: Myron Watts

customer_reviews.title: Have to use the cord
customer_reviews.text: kids have to still use the cord otherwise it just stops working - darn and I bought THREE of them!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Martin

customer_reviews.title: They're great as long as I'm very close to my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd read more reviews before purchasing these. They're great as long as I'm very close to my laptop. But I wanted to be able to move around through my condo and not need to be next to my laptop at all times, but my laptop needs to be in site. Perhaps the bluetooth connection I have is partly to blame?
customer_reviews.author: Sonja S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in LOVE with these. They work great. He wears them while working out and has gone on runs with them. Loves the touch screen and the quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Horgan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It is strange to gove feedback on the first day after the tem arrived. So far it is good. The design is perfect, and it is comfortable. The sound quality is perfect for me, I do not need a better one.. :) The way of volume + and - is a bit strange, I need to get used to it, just to swipe my finger on the right side of the headphone. If you listen to your music on a low volume, you can hear the headset "working" ... It sounds like a little HDD runs under the right cushion. Can be annoying. In one word: 9.5/10 points. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabor

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was amazing but stopped working within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my husband's birthday. He said the sound quality was great and they were comfortable and stylish. Unfortunately, they broke within three weeks with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Miles

customer_reviews.title: These work well and sound good. Battery life is nice and long
customer_reviews.text: I wish the touchpad wasn't so sensitive, that's my only complaint. These work well and sound good. Battery life is nice and long, I'd get most of the way through the week listening close to 6hrs a day. Definitely worth the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: William Russom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as los cabos but I think they will hold up longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Duran

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, work well, decent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised at how comfortable these are - even after hours of use. Battery lasts 8-10 hours, which is pretty fantastic. Only real complaint I have is that the volume settings are a little wonky. There is no middle point for volume with the headset - swiping up at a certain point is too loud, and swiping down results in audio that is too quiet. Considering you can hand-adjust the volume on your device, it's only a minor nuisance, but still a bit of a nuisance all the same. Granular volume control would be nice. Also seem to hiccup/skip every once in a while for no (immediately) apparent reason. Would recommend them for comfort, price, and general reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Jay F

customer_reviews.title: ... tried so far and by far these are the best. The touch pad is quick and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Bluetooth headphones I've tried so far and by far these are the best. The touch pad is quick and easy to use. They connect fast and have a good signal. The sound is wonderfully rich everywhere. The headphones are very comfortable and have a long battery life, I've never been surprised with a low battery. If you are looking for a good pair, this is a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Major

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Already love them 1 day later. Super light and comfy. Good sound. Have not needed to test range but will update if I have any problem.
customer_reviews.author: TheRainsFamily

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These stopped working, which is disappointing because they worked amazingly well when I first received them.
customer_reviews.author: ms_elusive

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones. Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Good sound, very comfortable, great battery life. They work on a treadmill as well as they work around the house. They work for podcasts and audiobooks and every music genre I've tried. Probably about 32ft range depending on walls before the sound starts hiccuping. Battery life is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wisecarver

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Sensitive controls
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones! The controls are a little sensitive. Gets some getting used to. After an hour or two my ears get a little sore. Still really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well can be used as wireless did slightly above average when mowing
customer_reviews.author: joy tolleson

customer_reviews.title: nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: There are great. nearly perfect and deliver on all promises. the only complaint I have is the volume adjustment is difficult to get precise. a swipe up or down could be too loud or soft and if you're too gentle It might not catch. sometimes there's a strange moment of disconnect when trying to change volume. like it mutes briefly and comes back aftern1 second. I don't know maybe I'm doing it wrong. aside from that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: robert hugel

customer_reviews.title: The best item I have ever bought for myself and would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: This headphones is awesome. I am so happy I bought it. The best item I have ever bought for myself and would recommend it to others. This is for keeps
customer_reviews.author: Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but awkard to control headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and fits comfortably on my head and ears. Love using them when I go work out. My only issue are the touch controls. I don't feel that it works half the time and lags behind way too much for me to actually use it. Would have entirely prefer actual buttons for controls as opposed to a sleeker design.
customer_reviews.author: Robotlost

customer_reviews.title: Veteran approved :)
customer_reviews.text: Military grade look alike. This veteran approved wish they would make more of them :)
customer_reviews.author: Zen dragon

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Not the world's greatest sound quality, the highs could be a little clearer, but good bass. The only thing I'm not overly thrilled with is the touch controls. Apparently I haven't gotten the hang of them yet, but once I do I'm sure I'll love them. Very sturdy, the band is metal and bends easily. The carrying case is especially helpful since I put these in my gym bag. I haven't had any issues with them not connecting or losing connection. I'd previously purchased a cheaper pair of BT headphones but the band was plastic and broke. It's worth spending the extra money knowing they're going to hold up. Definitely worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schomaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped for, comfortable, easy to use. That simple. Even the phone feature which I had doubts about worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Lloy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife. Good sound and good value. I would definitely recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: TechBuyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound quality, affordable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these headphones. I take them with me wherever I go. They do start to get uncomfortable after a couple hours on your head, but it just reminds me that I shouldn't sit and watch TV or listen to music with them on all day ;) Would definitely recommend to a friend. Sound quality is GREAT. The price is even better! The blue coloring isn't quite the electric blue that you see in the photos, however. There's definitely a green-ish hue to it, and it appears more teal than electric blue. Regardless, they still are sweet and I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, can't beat it, especially for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Basspro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of wireless headphones I've owned. They have a nice rich sound and excellent range.
customer_reviews.author: GROWE

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues and their QA line refused my first call
customer_reviews.text: Was a good headset until one of the wires inside started breaking after about 7 months of daily use... now my left speaker works and the right speaker sometimes works. Tried getting customer service on the phone to see what could be done and they hung up before speaking with me. Someone actually picked up the phone and killed the call...what the heck? also tried emailing them on issues when sinking up with a pc, never heard a response.... the rings on the side of the speakers also pop off, glued mine back on
customer_reviews.author: HULKGAMECRIT

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with both the service and the product!
customer_reviews.text: Really quick delivery! The headphones are lightweight and sound great...haven't given them a good workout yet but my first impression is 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Conquest

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE HEADPHONES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones!! I wrote already to say how pleased I am with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! These are great headphones. They sound every bit as good as my Beats Studio Wireless. Can't believe how inexpensive they are. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: JimmyRotten

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable headphones. Nice and loud, and stays on well. Husband uses it for jogging and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Howell

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality, i got some beats just after these and these definitely have quality comparable to beats. bluetooth works great, has a really long battery life which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: gravy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! comfortable, impressive sound, love the touch pad. I use these a lot while mowing mu lawn and it's handy I can control my volume and change songs with the ear pad.
customer_reviews.author: identicalimpulse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heaphones!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted for much cheaper than most. Extremely well crafted, amazing sounding. I may buy a yellow pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging, comfortable, easy to setup and use. A little tight but I have a big head I wear a 7 5/8ths hat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars should mean that the product is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are pretty cool. I like the optional headphone jack. The swipe controls aren't perfect, but they're functional enough. Great battery life! Better sound than my Moto-S10's. I use them everyday. Fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Headphones for the GYM and Anything else you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Outdoor Headphones for the GYM and Anything else you LOVE to do OUTDOORS!!! It is also lightweight that is Bluetooth with a built in Mic when working out and someone is trying to reach you!!! Great Sounds Treble & Bass As Well!!! =D
customer_reviews.author: AaronJoel Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love them. What I have been looking for for years. No wires, great sound. They stay on my head, but are not uncomfortable. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier. The style, the sound, and freedom! These headphones were well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I'm obsessed with these headphones and they arrived way before they were supposed to! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Touch controls are awesome. They are very comfortable, super easy to use and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Lee

customer_reviews.title: The connector for the power charger comes loose and disconnected inside the ear piece
customer_reviews.text: We bought two pair and for both the connector for the power charger on the headset ear piece broke off and is loose inside so it can no longer be charged. We bought both pairs in January and both pairs are dead within two months. This last pair we just opened last week so it lasted less than seven days.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Arendt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The device charges fast, all the features advertised are present with the device. The only problem for me was that I just could not get past the sound quality. I do not know how to explain it other than I get the same sound from 12 dollar headphones. If you are buying this for your kids it is perfect, the ear pads do not cover your entire ear so it would fit a smaller head nicely. Unfortunately I am going to give mine away to someone in my family who would appreciate it more than I can.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Garaitonandia

customer_reviews.title: These were wonderful headphones at first
customer_reviews.text: These were wonderful headphones at first! I have only had them for a few months and they've completely deteriorated. First, the cord stopped working so I had to hold it in a certain position to get any quality sound. Then I used them wirelessly, which worked great until the right ear just stopped working and you could hear the parts just shuffling around in there. I don't put my headphones through any serious wear and tear, so they shouldn't have been rendered useless in this short a time. I'm extremely disappointed because I know these would've been my go to since I liked the sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for under $100
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving these headphones! It is everythinng you would ask for in a bluetooth headphones under $100
customer_reviews.author: Panit Panusiri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great style, great sound!!! Verry fast shipping to Switzerland !!!
customer_reviews.author: Erich Beyeler

customer_reviews.title: The best bluetooth headphones on the market for the price
customer_reviews.text: The best bluetooth headphones on the market for the price. I can't believe these are not flying off shelves. They are extremely comfortable and cancel all exterior noise for me in normal situations, of course. This is my third time purchasing them (one for me, boyfriend, backup). Love!
customer_reviews.author: Jett1961

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the sound from these headphones and they look amazing, but forget it if you plan on listening for longer than an hour. After 30 minutes they start to get uncomfortable and by an hour it is unbearable. Your ears will be in actual pain. I typically have these on when I work and I have to give my ears a break after a bit so they can recuperate. I've even left them stretched out over a box for a day and it didn't help. It's a shame I can't keep listening to these headphones as long as I'd like because I do enjoy the sound it produces.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The carrying bag is a very nice fabric, but beware
customer_reviews.text: Battery life and portability are all major pluses with the headphones. The carrying bag is a very nice fabric, but beware, its white color will pick up stains easily. The headphones have decent sound quality, and do leak noise at higher volume levels. Solid set of on ear headphones overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Outdoor Tech OT1400 Privates - Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with Touch Control (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

OUTDOOR TECHNOLOGY OT1400 PRIVATES HEADPHONES
THE FREEDOM OF TOUCH CONTROLLED BLUETOOTH
These are the Privates, Outdoor Tech's touch control Bluetooth wireless headphones. They feature a touchpad interface on the right earpiece that allows you to change tracks and control volume with the swipe of a finger, built-in call functionality, a 3.5 mm AUX jack for plug-in capability and a tough canvas wrap around the headband. The Privates are better-looking than a glass of scotch after that middle-seat flight between Sweaty Mister Johnson and Screaming Baby Timmy and more convenient than a twelve gauge when the zombies end up at your house.

FULLY WIRELESS, FULLY PORTABLE
The Privates cordless headphones wirelessly connect with your smartphone, tablet, laptop, or any other Bluetooth enabled device, and operate via a touch pad on the right earpiece. Simply swipe your finger left or right to skip tracks and up or down to change volume. The Privates stream crystal-clear audio for a range of up to 32 feet for 10 hours on a single charge. So yes, you can put your phone on one side of a river, take a boat across and listen to music on the other side, but in all honesty that's not a very good story or an effective use of your time.

BUILT-IN CALL FUNCTIONALITY
When connected to your phone, the Privates' built-in microphone allows you to make and receive hands-free calls from anywhere, anytime. One press of the multifunction button allows you to answer or hang up a call without ever touching your phone, so you can use your hands for more important things, like digging for treasure.

THE SKY IS THE LIMIT
The Privates Bluetooth headphones come with lots of extra little features. A 3.5 mm auxiliary jack allows you to use them in situations that don't allow for Bluetooth connectivity, like on an airplane or with a non-Bluetooth device. This port also lets you use them if you forgot to charge them. The Privates also project a fuel gauge onto your device that actively tells you how much juice you've got left. Integrated hinges allow you to fold and stow your Privates when they are not in use. Swivel ear pads make for the most comfy headphone out there. Finally, they come with a signature ODT carry pouch. Details count. You don't get a toy with your Happy Meal just arbitrarily.



DETAILS. DETAILS. DETAILS
 * 40 mm drivers for clear mids and solid bass Real, real comfortable ear pads 
 * Built-in microphone for making and receiving calls 
 * Only ONE button (yes, really). The rest is touch control, pretty cool 
 * Foldable and flexible 
 * Works with any Bluetooth-enabled device 
 * Bluetooth version 3.0 
 * Battery level "fuel gauge" displayed on source device 
 * 3.5 mm AUX jack 
 * Play Time: 10 hours 
 * Package Includes: USB to micro-USB charging cable, 3.5 mm to 3.5 mm color-matched cable and signature ODT carry pouch

specifications.Manufacturer: The Ketchum Group DBA Outdoor Technology
